channel.title: Commands dont work / help?
channel.description: So some of the commands work but some dont like ::item etc etc, ::npc etc etc. and everytime i try to use a ::command < it keeps on telling me '' player is offline '' i was wondering why is that and how to fix?

item.title: Commands dont work / help?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Lucifer jv:

administrator, and its with every command… like lets say i go ::item 34 34, it will execute the command but the ‘’ player must be offline still comes up in chatbox ‘’ the ::npc 34 1 lets say it wont execute the command and just say ‘’ player must be offline ‘’

Replace your admin commands with this one, compile, then try using the item command or the npc command again, and tell me what it says. It should say “Player must be offline #_”. Tell me the number it gives you.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands dont work / help?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Give me an example of a command you’re trying to use that sends you the “____ player is offline.” message. Also, is the account you’re using the command on an Administrator, or what rank is it?

Read full topic
